trans-unit.source: Moves a directory and all sub-directories and files.

seg-source.mrk: Moves a directory and all sub-directories and files.

target.mrk: Moves a directory and all sub-directories and files.

trans-unit.source: Path of the source directory (with no trailing backslash). e.g. "C:\Path1"

seg-source.mrk: Path of the source directory (with no trailing backslash).

target.mrk: Path of the source directory (with no trailing backslash).

trans-unit.source: Path of the destination dir (with no trailing backslash). e.g. "C:\Path_Copy"

seg-source.mrk: Path of the destination dir (with no trailing backslash).

target.mrk: Path of the destination dir (with no trailing backslash).

trans-unit.source: [optional] this flag determines whether to overwrite files if they already exist:

seg-source.mrk: this flag determines whether to overwrite files if they already exist:

target.mrk: this flag determines whether to overwrite files if they already exist:

trans-unit.source: 0 if there is an error moving the directory.

seg-source.mrk: 0 if there is an error moving the directory.

target.mrk: 0 if there is an error moving the directory.

trans-unit.source: If the source and destination are on different volumes or UNC paths are used then a copy/delete operation will be performed rather than a move.

seg-source.mrk: If the source and destination are on different volumes or UNC paths are used then a copy/delete operation will be performed rather than a move.

target.mrk: If the source and destination are on different volumes or UNC paths are used then a copy/delete operation will be performed rather than a move.

trans-unit.source: If the destination already exists and the overwrite flag is specified then the source directory will be moved inside the destination.

seg-source.mrk: If the destination already exists and the overwrite flag is specified then the source directory will be moved inside the destination.

target.mrk: If the destination already exists and the overwrite flag is specified then the source directory will be moved inside the destination.

trans-unit.source: Because AutoIt lacks a "DirRename" function, use DirMove() to rename a folder!

seg-source.mrk: Because AutoIt lacks a "DirRename" function, use DirMove() to rename a folder!

target.mrk: Because AutoIt lacks a "DirRename" function, use DirMove() to rename a folder!
